Class BaseItemStackHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.items.ItemStackHandler
      • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.inventory.BaseItemStackHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.common.util.INBTSerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundNBT>, net.minecraftforge.items.IItemHandler, net.minecraftforge.items.IItemHandlerModifiable

    public class BaseItemStackHandler
extends net.minecraftforge.items.ItemStackHandler
    Copied from Cucumber and modified.

    An ItemStackHandler with some extra features.
